column1: Reduce the number of questions included in the core set
Make all questions belonging to core set
In question 1 add option "reported by medical"
Add a question to ask how many days after the injury the form was filled out
Rephrase “acute” and “overuse” with “sudden onset” and “gradual onset”
In “Contact type” include the option "unclear"
In “Type of contact” include "collision"
In “Tackle direction”, restructure the answers
In “Physical activity – running activity” include “curved run”
Remove controlling phase
Ball situation: add “ball being contested for”
Remove pitch condition
Include pitch condition in core set
Include additional options for referee decision
Remove player attention
Remove question about where was the player when the injury occurred
Change playing position questions
Include option “Not possible to determine/unclear”
Include a guideline/user manual
Add question for change of direction to indicate the side injured
Running intensity should be discussed during the meeting for alternatives
Ball situation: include a question for player error
Add a question to specify ball impact in kicking - player activity
Include sub-phases for goalkeepers in playing sub-phase
Include “other” option in playing sub-phase
Include own team’s current ranking
Include opponent teams ranking
Include phase of season
Include time of match/training of injury
Specify how many minutes the injured player played
